title: Outerfields Build in Public Lab - Completion
description: Complete the Build in Public Lab showcase for Outerfields PCN platform. Focus on documentation, testing, and polish to make the showcase production-ready.

stories.title: Technical Documentation and README
stories.description: Create comprehensive README documenting the Build in Public Lab showcase. Include local setup, deployment, architecture overview, and component documentation.
acceptance: README.md exists at packages/agency/clients/outerfields/
Documents local development setup (pnpm install, dev server)
Explains Build in Public Lab concept and 90-day timeline
Lists all 9 showcase components with descriptions
Documents Cloudflare integrations (R2 CDN, KV stores)
Includes deployment instructions for Cloudflare Pages
Links to live demo and related documentation

stories.title: Component Tests for Showcase Features
stories.description: Write unit tests for key showcase components to ensure stability. Focus on BuildProgress, FeaturedVideos, VideoModal, and ComponentLab.
acceptance: Tests directory exists at packages/agency/clients/outerfields/tests/
BuildProgress.test.ts tests timeline rendering and day calculation
FeaturedVideos.test.ts tests video grid and KV integration
VideoModal.test.ts tests player controls and engagement tracking
ComponentLab.test.ts tests tool showcase and interaction
All tests pass: pnpm test --filter=outerfields
Test coverage >60% for tested components

stories.title: E2E Test for User Journey
stories.description: Create E2E test that validates the complete user journey through the Build in Public Lab: homepage → build progress → featured videos → component lab → pricing.
acceptance: E2E test file exists at packages/agency/clients/outerfields/tests/e2e/showcase-journey.spec.ts
Test navigates through key sections in order
Validates BuildProgress timeline displays correctly
Clicks and plays a video from FeaturedVideos
Interacts with ComponentLab tools
Verifies pricing tiers display ($49/$149/$399)
Test passes with Playwright or similar E2E framework

stories.title: Mobile Responsive Verification
stories.description: Verify and fix any mobile responsive issues. Ensure all components work correctly on mobile viewports (375px, 768px, 1024px).
acceptance: All components tested on 375px (mobile), 768px (tablet), 1024px (desktop)
VideoModal controls accessible on touch screens
Navigation menu functional on mobile
ComponentLab tools interactive on mobile
Typography scales correctly with clamp()
No horizontal scroll issues on mobile
Touch targets meet 44px minimum accessibility standard

stories.title: Performance Optimization
stories.description: Optimize bundle size and performance. Lazy load videos, optimize images, ensure fast First Contentful Paint.
acceptance: VideoModal lazy loads video content
Images use appropriate sizes with srcset
Bundle size <500KB (excluding video assets)
Lighthouse score >90 on performance
First Contentful Paint <1.5s
No console errors or warnings in production build

stories.title: SEO and Meta Tags
stories.description: Ensure proper SEO meta tags, Open Graph tags, and structured data for social sharing and search visibility.
acceptance: All pages have unique title and description meta tags
Open Graph tags present for social sharing
Twitter Card tags configured
Structured data (JSON-LD) for Organization and WebSite
Canonical URLs set correctly
robots.txt and sitemap.xml exist
No duplicate meta tags or missing alt text

stories.title: Deployment Documentation
stories.description: Document the Cloudflare Pages deployment process with step-by-step instructions for future updates.
acceptance: DEPLOYMENT.md exists at packages/agency/clients/outerfields/
Documents Cloudflare Pages setup (project, domain, build settings)
Explains R2 bucket configuration for video assets
Documents KV namespace setup for view counts and engagement
Includes environment variables configuration
Provides rollback instructions
Documents monitoring and analytics setup

stories.title: Copy Polish and Voice Canon Compliance
stories.description: Review and refine all copy throughout the site to ensure clarity, compelling messaging, and Voice Canon compliance.
acceptance: All section headlines are clear and compelling
CTAs use action-oriented language
No marketing jargon flagged by /audit-voice
Pricing tier descriptions are specific and benefit-focused
BuildProgress timeline copy explains the 90-day journey
Testimonials provide specific value statements
Copy follows Voice Canon: clarity over cleverness, specificity over generality

stories.title: Analytics Integration
stories.description: Integrate analytics tracking for Build in Public metrics. Track video plays, component interactions, and user journey.
acceptance: Cloudflare Web Analytics or Plausible integrated
Custom events tracked: video plays, tool interactions, pricing tier views
Build progress milestones logged as events
No PII collected, privacy-friendly tracking
Analytics dashboard accessible to team
Weekly metrics summary automated

stories.title: Accessibility Audit and Fixes
stories.description: Perform accessibility audit using axe or similar tool. Fix any WCAG 2.1 AA violations.
acceptance: Axe DevTools reports 0 violations
All images have descriptive alt text
Interactive elements have focus indicators
Color contrast meets WCAG AA standards (4.5:1 text, 3:1 UI)
Keyboard navigation works for all interactive elements
Screen reader tested with VoiceOver or NVDA
ARIA labels present where needed
